title: Lunchbox Goes to The Mall to Sit On Santa’s Lap + Name That Christmas Movie! + Eddie Submits his own Question to the Mailbag!
itunes:title: Lunchbox Goes to The Mall to Sit On Santa’s Lap + Name That Christmas Movie! + Eddie Submits his own Question to the Mailbag!
description:
Lunchbox went to the mall to sit on Santa’s lap and read him what’s on his wish list this year. And yes, it’s just as awkward as it sounds. We play a clip from a famous Christmas movie…just name the movie! Eddie has a situation at a Mexican restaurant, so he decided to write into the mailbag to get help with how to deal with a rude waiter. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
